tools_and_affordances.name: Code Repository Access
tools_and_affordances.description: Ability to read and write code to a version control system (Git, SVN, etc.).

tools_and_affordances.name: Test Environment Integration
tools_and_affordances.description: Capability to run automated tests, unit tests, and integration tests in a sandboxed or staging environment.

tools_and_affordances.name: DevOps & CI/CD Pipeline
tools_and_affordances.description: Permissions to trigger builds, manage deployments, and integrate with continuous integration tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, etc.).

tools_and_affordances.name: Shell Environment
tools_and_affordances.description: Access to run commands on development/staging servers (e.g., installing dependencies, running scripts).

tools_and_affordances.name: Web Access & Documentation Lookup
tools_and_affordances.description: Ability to search online resources (Stack Overflow, documentation sites) to gather best practices or code snippets.

tools_and_affordances.name: Issue Tracking / Project Management
tools_and_affordances.description: Integration with Jira, Trello, or equivalent systems to create, update, and close tickets related to refactoring tasks.
